name: The Curious Case of Samual Williams
name_original: The Curious Case of Samual Williams
description:
Controls

  • WASD = Movement
  • E = Interact/Talk

Story

You are a paranormal investigator solving the case of Samual Williams after getting the to Williams residence it turns out that there are too many ghosts and the player needs to find Samuel among the crowd of ghosts

Features

  • Lots of Ghosts!
  • Ghost Jokes
  • Murder Mystery Shenanigans
